p: In this review, several issues affecting the production of ω-3 FAs supplements from fish waste material will be discussed, including waste composition, storage, and processing, focusing on the sustainability of the processes and providing a basic overview of the potentialities of supercritical fluids in different steps of the supplement production. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first review covering the whole process from waste to ω-3 FAs formulations for supplement applications. The main aim is to provide the interested reader with a wide and complete overview of the topic and to improve the sustainable exploitation of this valuable resource.
